title: Mailto has stopped working
content: I have always used Gmail to email links, but it has stopped working. In Settings/General/Applications, the 'mailto" gives only the options "always ask", "Firefox (default)" and "use other". Previously the option to select Gmail was there. In fact, the list of applications only has 6 items instead of the numerous ones that were there previously.
creator: lindabknight

title: Firefox crashes MacBook Pro m1 with latest Monterey beta 12.4
content: As soon as I open Firefox, the browser freezes and then the fans turn on and the entire computer crashes. This is happening with Monterey beta 12.4 release that was just release a couple of days ago. It is impossible to do anything, this has happened a dozen times. I have no idea how come Firefox can crash the entire computer. What is going on ? And how to fix it ?
creator: markzsayegh

title: voice recognition
content:
Hi I don't know how to reply to the previous message that somebody sent to me. I was asking if there is any. Voice search for Firefox as chrome and edge do. he sent me a page that I think it's in Spanish.does nay one know about the voice search regarding Firefox please let me know. 

thanks
creator: Azin

title: I updated to Firefox 99.0 and then my icloud Mac Mail won't work.
content: I updated to Firefox 99.0 yesterday, and ever since then, I cannot login to my icloud Mac Mail. I've spent hours on the phone with Apple customer support and they can't fix it. I can login to my Mac Mail via icloud.com when using a browser, but not on my computer itself. I think it's related to the 99.0 update (just based on the timing) but Apple isn't sure. My OS is High Sierra (10.13.6). Has anyone had a similar experience after updating? Any suggestions? Does Mozilla have a customer support number that I can call and talk to someone? I couldn't find a phone number under Contact Us. Thanks for the help!
creator: dfb9165

title: costco reviews are not showing
content:
Costco reviews do not show. I've tried clearing all cookies and history, but the problem persists. I've tried starting in troubleshoot mode, but the problem persists. I've tried refreshing firefox, but the problem persists. The costco reviews show just fine in the Microsoft Edge browser.

What is the problem? Is there a fix for this problem?
creator: D000D

title: Latest version 99.0 is causing problems with Amazon order lookup page
content: After updating to the latest version 99.0, my Amazon order lookup page is stuck in a loop while trying to load the page - it tries to load the page over and over again. This doesn't happen with Google Chrome or MS Edge browsers. Also, other Amazon pages seem to work OK. I've tried restarting my computer, clear the cache, and start Firefox in troubleshooting mode, but none worked. Any ideas on what's going on and how to fix this?
creator: andrakin8
